thread.title: Jimmy Kimmel Leads Standing Ovation for Meryl Streep at Oscars 2017 - Jimmy Kimmel Meryl Streep Speech Oscars 2017
thread.title_full: Jimmy Kimmel Leads Standing Ovation for Meryl Streep at Oscars 2017 - Jimmy Kimmel Meryl Streep Speech Oscars 2017

author: Lauren Alexis Fisher
title: Jimmy Kimmel Leads Standing Ovation for Meryl Streep at Oscars 2017 - Jimmy Kimmel Meryl Streep Speech Oscars 2017

organizations.name: jimmy kimmel leads standing ovation for meryl streep

text:
Only Meryl Streep could get a standing ovation simply for being Meryl Streep—and that's exactly what happened tonight at the Oscars. In his opening monologue, host Jimmy Kimmel came to Streep's defense after President Trump attacked her on Twitter following her Golden Globes acceptance speech last month. (In case you forgot, Trump infamously referred to Streep as "one of the most over-rated actresses in Hollywood.")
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
Meryl Streep, one of the most over-rated actresses in Hollywood, doesn't know me but attacked last night at the Golden Globes. She is a
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) January 9, 2017
